description: Non-material amendment to planning permissions ref. 20729/G/95/1825 & 20729/APP/2006/1753 dated 07-08-1996 & 20-07-2007 (Installation of twelve eight metre high floodlights around three existing courts/ Installation of 9, eight metre high floodlighting columns to Courts 1, 2 and 3) to convert the existing metal halide lights as approved to new LED equivalents.
decision_conditions: The development hereby permitted shall not be carried out except in complete accordance with the details shown on the submitted plans, numbers Untitled Location Plan, MLS830/WAYFARERSTC/EXTLIGHT/001 Rev. A, MLS830/WAYFARERSTC/EXTLIGHT/002 Rev. A,

MLS/8M/CFL/SINGLE Rev. A, Lighting calculation (Midlands Lighting Solutions, ref: MLS830, dated 06-10-2022) and shall thereafter be retained/maintained for as long as the development remains in existence.
To ensure the development complies with the provisions Hillingdon Local Plan Parts 1 (November 2012) and 2 (January 2020) and the London Plan (2021).
Notwithstanding the non-material amendment hereby approved, all conditions relating to planning permission refs: 20729/G/95/1825 and 20729/APP/2006/1753,must be adhered to as per those permissions.
